mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart (cartid, mid, bid, cartquan, cartdate) values (seq_cart.nextval, #{mid}, #{bid}, #{cartquan}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select c.cartid, c.mid, c.bid, c.cartquan, c.cartdate, b.bname, b.bprice, img.filename, img.uploadpath from tbl_cart c left outer join tbl_book b on c.bid = b.bid left outer join tbl_book_img img on c.bid = img.bid where mid = #{mid} and img.filename like '%mainimg%' order by c.cartid
select * from tbl_cart where mid = #{mid} and bid = #{bid}
mapper.update: update tbl_cart set cartquan = #{cartquan} where cartid = #{cartid}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_cart where mid = #{mid} and bid = #{bid}
